title: vedova

content: Hello,we've started with this new exciting token project "Lira" Symbol LIRA. Lira is a utility token used to purchase goods or services.Available Blockchains:Ethereum (ERC-20) / BSC (BEP-20) / Cronos (CRC-20) / Polygon (MRC-20) / Avalanche (ARC-20)Fantom (FRC-20) / Solana (SOL) / Tron (TRC-20) / Waves (WAVES) / Terra & Terra Classic (CW-20)Contracts:BSC 0xA80a006A48dc7203EB3AA7E0b3816918d242CFC4 ( Symbol LIRA - Decimals 18 )ETH/CRO/MATIC/AVAX/FTM 0x8031c44b96ec8c9b66ab16c2c164e8deeb361a3f (Symbol LIRA - Decimals 18 )SOLANA 8Qx33mx7yGZ3QaDoshVNAx8ojj1J9kzfvwpSWdHBqsBM ( Symbol LIRA - Decimals 9 )TRON TVmQz4tGg1K4ufyjsMJDwYnYLCR7UaMsu1 ( Symbol LIRA - Decimals 18 )WAVES ADV9FPGKFmCqxfta6vyieBasC1kDtLczYjjLw1NtDQko ( Symbol LIRA - Decimals 8 )TERRA terra1ee4g63c3sus9hnyyp3p2u3tulzdv5ag68l55q8ej64y4qpwswvus5mtag2 ( Symbol LIRA - Decimals 6 )TERRA CLASSIC terra1kn85pdmrhhk2upjj8hf97lx3w3jg6gyzasyksp ( Symbol LIRA - Decimals 6 )(also you use these details to add Lira Token (LIRA) in your wallet since listing is just coming)The circulating supply and minting of token will be limited to encourage healthy and natural price maintenance.Una tantum burns are also planned. Addition of liquidity pools in the various exchanges like PanCakeSwap etc, is currently in progress.Our website is https://lira.financial - Blog https://lira.financial/blog - Whitepaper https://lira.financial/whitepaperOther discussion sites/groups:Medium: https://medium.com/@lirafinancialFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/lirafinancialInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/lirafinancialLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/liraTwitter: https://twitter.com/lirafinancialVK: https://vk.com/lirafinancialReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/LiraFinancialYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrncZSVVcLng3KXW6EilkWgTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/lirafinancialTikTok: www.tiktok.com/@lirafinancialTelegram discussion group: https://t.me/lirafinancialTelegram news channel: https://t.me/lirafinancial_newsDiscord server: https://discord.gg/T8xUu9nhFnGitHub: https://github.com/lirafinancial/liraOf course anyone who would like to participate in the project is welcome, details here https://lira.financial/careers/Thank you for your time,Emanuele
